description:
Test Steps:

1- Go To Url ( http://live.techpanda.org/ ) 
2- Verify Title Of The Page Is THIS IS DEMO SITE. 
3- Click On Mobile Category.
4- Verify Title Of The Page Is MOBILE.
5- In List Of All Mobiles, Select 'SORT BY' Dropdown As 'Name'.

Expected Result:

- Verify All Products Are Sorted By Name Correctly 

Actual Result:

- All Products Sorted By Name 

Priority:

- High
